titleStmt.title: Hieraspistes a defence by way of apology for the ministry and ministers of the Church of England : humbly presented to the consciences of all those that excell in virtue. / By John Gauden, D. D. and minister of that Church at Bocking in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Andrew Crooke, and are to be sold at the Green Dragon in St. Paul's-Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With an added engraved title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Green Dragon in St. Paul's-Church-yard
